Tutorial.Text: Well done! You're now in the hallway. (This is a dialog bubble. Click the arrow to continue.)
Hold your cursor at the right or left edges of the screen to shift your view of the room.
You can inspect an object by clicking on it with your cursor (now a magnifying glass).
Don't be afraid to inspect anything you see!

Simon.Text: Hi, I'm Simon! Nice to meet you.

Conversation.Text: From what I've seen, it seems like a hotel or something.
If it is a hotel, they'd have a reception area, right?
And hotels usually have reception on the ground floor, right?
So if we go downstairs, maybe we'll find someone!

Air-Vent.Text: Why are there so many of these in this place?

You-Died.Text: Good job, you died. Way to go

Door-7.Text: The door to Room #7. This is the room I came out of.

Room-7.Text: This is the room I woke up in.
It looks just like the others. Is this a hotel?

Wall.Text: Why do you keep looking at it?

Door-Numbers.Text: All of these doors are numbered: 5, 6, 7, 8...

Door-Frame.Text: This door frame is made of nice wood...

Enter-Lab.Text: Is this some sort of laboratory?

Stairs.Text: I don't know how to walk on stairs...

Adam.Text: We could ask you the same thing!
Uh, well, my name's Adam, but I'm not really sure what's going on...

Convo1.Text: What kind of bird was that?
